type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Fall Sounds

---

Changes the entity's fall sounds.

---

### Example
```json
{
  "type": "moborigins:fall_sounds",
  "big_fall_sound": "minecraft:entity.slime.squish",
  "small_fall_sound": "minecraft:entity.slime.squish_small"
}
```
Changes the entity's fall sounds to the slimes squish sounds.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Fall Sounds

---

Changes the entity's fall sounds.

---

### Example
```json
{
  "type": "moborigins:fall_sounds",
  "big_fall_sound": "minecraft:entity.slime.squish",
  "small_fall_sound": "minecraft:entity.slime.squish_small"
}
```
Changes the entity's fall sounds to the slimes squish sounds.

distance.description: The distance the entity must fall to play the big fall sound.
distance.markdownDescription: The distance the entity must fall to play the big fall sound.

small_fall_sound.description: The sound to play when the entity falls a small distance.
small_fall_sound.markdownDescription: The sound to play when the entity falls a small distance.

big_fall_sound.description: The sound to play when the entity falls a big distance.
big_fall_sound.markdownDescription: The sound to play when the entity falls a big distance.
